scenario_text.value: Ick, the webs even got inside the drawers...
Hmm? Is this...a spirit lamp?

Huh, what kinda gadget is this? How do we use
this thing?

Huh, what kinda gadget is that? How do we use
this thing?

You can light it on fire and burn things...
We could use it for light now, too.

But we can’t grab it now. The cobwebs are in
the way.

Hyaaah! ...Yeesh, you aren’t kidding. Not
even my claws can dig it out. Ewww, so sticky...

Hmm, I bet it would be useful to us, but
we have to take care of those webs first...
Hey, what the heck’re you guys doing?
Oh, it’s you, Ryo. Uh, how do I explain...

I heard ya, I heard ya. Trying to melt webs,
right? Jeez, let me sneak right up on you...
Kewww...
I bet vinegar would do the trick..
Really? You think so?

I went around my house as a kid putting
stickers on stuff. Man, my mom was piiissed.

Back then, I was taught that it’s easier to
remove stickers with vinegar.
Man, my mommy sure was cool back then...
Kewy?
Mommy...?
I, I didn’t say nothing!

Anyway, all you need to know is that vinegar
unsticks the sticky stuff!

Vinegar, uh... Thanks, Ryo, that’s a big
help.
Hmph...

We’d better look for some vinegar, Agumon.
Lets go!
Way ahead of you!

Vinegar works against sticky stuff. Not
a lotta places they’d keep it in school, huh?
Ick, the webs even got inside the drawers...
Hmm? Is this...a spirit lamp?

Huh, what kinda gadget is that? How do we use
this thing?

You can light it on fire and burn things...
We could use it for light now, too.

But we can’t grab it now. The cobwebs are in
the way.

Hyaaah! ...Yeesh, you aren’t kidding. Not
even my claws can dig it out. Ewww, so sticky...

Hmm, I bet it would be useful to us, but
we have to take care of those webs first...
Let’s leave it alone for now.

We can’t do anything with those webs in the
way. Let’s leave it be.

I tried pouring some vinegar on the webs, but
I didn’t see any difference...

I didn’t say it’d work on the webs. Just that
it stops sticky things from being sticky.

Hyaaah! Ohhh, look, Takuma! It isn’t sticky
anymore!
I can pull the webs off, no problem!
Really?! Go on, then, take care of the rest!
Way ahead of you!
There, I took it all off!

That vinegar really did the trick. Thanks
again, Ryo!
Yeah, thanks!
Kewwwy!

Whatever. Don’t get worked up over every
little thing...

(Still, there’s not a lot of this stuff left.
Better use it wisely.)
Now we can take the spirit lamp with us.

Oh, but we’ll need something to light it.
Hopefully we find something around here...
You want fire? I can spit fire, you know!
Wait, WHAT? You can do that, too?
Yeah! I’m strong, I tell ya!

I see... And how strong is this flame,
exactly?

Well, we’ll cross that bridge when we come
to it.

At least we got our hands on something good.
Now we just have to find Aoi!
To the search!
...Huh, that’s strange.

This room is falling apart, but the lamp is
in good shape.

Just like the first-aid kit Aoi found. This
keeps getting weirder and weirder...

I tried pouring some vinegar on the webs, but
I didn’t see any difference...

Hyaaah! Ohhh, look, Takuma! It isn’t sticky
anymore!
I can pull the webs off, no problem!
Really?! Go on, then, take care of the rest!
Way ahead of you!
There, I took it all off!
You did it, Agumon!

(Still, there’s not a lot of this stuff left.
Better use it wisely.)
That vinegar really did the trick.
And it’s all thanks to Ryo...

I’m sure he’s safe, Takuma. Let’s do our best
to save him!

Yeah...yeah, you’re right. We’ll rescue
everyone who got taken!

We can’t light this spirit lamp, but maybe
it’ll be useful somehow. I’ll take it.
You want fire? I can spit fire, you know!
Wait, WHAT? You can do that, too?
Yeah! I’m strong, I tell ya!

I see... And how strong is this flame,
exactly?

Well, we’ll cross that bridge when we come
to it.

At least we got our hands on something good.
Now we just have to save the others!
